title: Adventure/Casual/RPG - Music Pack
description: This Pack is designed for Adventure, Platform, Casual, Sim, Managing and RPG games.
longDescription:
This Pack is designed for Adventure, Platforms, Casual, Sim, Managing and RPG games.


Listen here.


This pack contains 71 files: full tracks, loops, variations and layers;  appropriate for missions, exploration, deep emotions, characters and battles.


All you need for interactive game music.
